artist: Sébastien Leroy; Louis Yves Quéverdo; François Pigeot; After Raphael Sanzio
description: Virgin seated in clouds above holding Christ Child; below St. John the Baptist and St. Francis of Assisi at left and St. Jerome and Sigismondo de Conti at right; directly below Virgin is a putto holding a tablet

title: The Madonna of Foligno
